Postal_Code_SetObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Postal_Code_SetObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Postal_Code_SetObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: A reference to the postal code set to be update, if any. Do not enter data here if you are creating a new postal code set.

Postal_Code_Set_Data.description: Name of the postal code set. This is required if creating a new set.
Description of the postal code set. This is not required.

Postal_Code_Data_Unverified.description: The numeric postal code to add to the set.

validation.validation: "[postal code]" is not a valid postal code for "[region]".

Country_RegionObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Country_RegionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Country_RegionObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Postal_Code_Data_Unverified.description: The country region that the postal code belongs to.

Postal_Code_Set_Data.description: The list of postal codes to add to this postal code set. All postal codes will be verified to be valid codes before they are added to the set.
The reference ID for the Postal Code Set.

description: The information to be used to update an existing set, or create a new set.

validation.validation: You must enter at least 1 Postal Code.
Enter a unique Postal Code Set name.
